name: IP_HANDOFF_INFO
description: This table contains contact related information.

columns.name: HANDOFF_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the handoff data record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: This item specifies the most recent user to update the handoff field.

columns.name: LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LAST_UPDATE_DTTM_DTTM
columns.description: This item specifies the most recent instant that the handoff field was updated.
